item.title: HuntressCTF CTF 2024 - writeups
item.description: Web Y2J (50 pts)A web application where we can convert Yaml to JSON. I learned the server uses python and by checking headers and looked for vulnerabilities regarding Yaml especially in Python YAML. Searched and found CVE-2020-14343 https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2020-14343 that allowed code execution in PyYAML library. This writeup explains and builds upon the payload. I used this payload to get the flag. 1 !!python/object/new:tuple [!!python/object/new:map [!!python/name:eval , [ "open('/flag.txt','r').read()" ]]] Plantopia (131 pts)We given a web application with credentials to the login page.
